products.name: Premium Yoga Mat
products.description: A high-quality, eco-friendly yoga mat with excellent grip and cushioning. Perfect for all types of yoga practices.

products.name: Yoga Block Set
products.description: A set of two durable yoga blocks made from natural cork material. Provides support and stability in yoga poses.

products.name: Yoga Strap with D-Ring
products.description: A versatile yoga strap with a D-ring buckle for adjusting length. Helps improve flexibility and deepen stretches.

products.name: Yoga Wheel
products.description: A yoga wheel made of high-quality TPE material. Great for stretching, balance, and enhancing yoga practice.

products.name: Yoga Mat Bag
products.description: A stylish and spacious yoga mat bag with multiple pockets for your mat, accessories, and essentials.

products.name: Yoga Pants
products.description: Comfortable and breathable yoga pants for women. Made from moisture-wicking fabric for a great workout.
